name: Titan Quest Anniversary Edition
notes:
Installer will Download base Game automatically. To install Ragnarok and Atlantis, download those from the GOG Website and then click "Run EXE inside wine prefix" and choose the installers.

At the end of all installations there will be errors you can just click ok on.

task.app: vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015 d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 win7
task.name: winetricks

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Titan Quest - Anniversary Edition/TQ.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015 d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 win7
    description: Installing dependencies
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Titan Quest
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
